info.title: CopilotX API
info.description: API to streamline unit assets, incident tickets and user assignment.

get.summary: Get units based on unit name and asset name
get.description: Returns detailed information about units identified from filters like name of the unit, name of asset, Multiple filters can be used in combination to refine the list of units returned

parameters.name: unitName
parameters.description: Name of the unit to retrieve

parameters.name: assetName
parameters.description: Name of the associated asset name with this unit

street.description: Street address of the unit location

postalCode.description: Postal code of the unit location

acquisitionDate.description: Date when the asset was acquired

items.description: List of ticket IDs associated with the asset

post.summary: Allocate or add asset to a unit
post.description: Allocate or add asset specified by name to a specific unit whose name is given by user

get.summary: Get assets based on asset name and asset id
get.description: Returns detailed information about assets identified from filters like name of the asset

parameters.name: assetName
parameters.description: Name of the asset to retrieve

get.summary: Get users based on user name, ticket name, certifications, skills, roles and hours available
get.description: Returns detailed information about users identified from filters like name of the user, name of ticket, certifications, skills, roles and hours available. Multiple filters can be used in combination to refine the list of users returned

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Name of the user to retrieve

parameters.name: skill
parameters.description: Skills for a user. Retrieve users with this skill

parameters.name: certification
parameters.description: Certification for a user. Retrieve users with this certification

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Role of a user. Retrieve users with this role

parameters.name: hoursAvailable
parameters.description: Hours a user is available for new work over this and next month. Please provide an integer value; for example 0 if no hours are available, 1 if any hours are available, or 20 if 20 or more hours are available.

get.summary: Get tickets matching a specified ticket name and/or user name and/or owner name
get.description: Returns detailed information about tickets matching the specified ticket name and/or user name and/or owner name

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: The name of the user assigned to the ticket

parameters.name: ownerName
parameters.description: The name of the owner of the ticket

post.summary: Create ticket with ticket name, owner name, asset name, description and priority
post.description: create ticket by specifying ticket name, owner name, asset name, description and priority

406.description: Ticket with specified name already exists

post.summary: Update description, status, priority, owner name and asset name of ticket given by ticket name
post.description: update description, status, priority, owner name and asset name of ticket given by ticket name. Any one or multiple values can be updated on the given ticket

post.summary: Assign user to a ticket when name, role owner flag and ticket name is specified.
post.description: Assign (add) user to a ticket when name, role, owner flag and ticket name is specified.

post.summary: comment on a ticket when ticket name, user name and comment text is specified.
post.description: comment on a ticket when ticket name, user name and comment text is specified.

get.summary: Get user profile of the logged in user.
get.description: Retrieve the user profile for the logged-in user including skills, roles, certifications, location, availability, and ticket assignments.

post.summary: log time to a ticket on behalf of the logged in user.
post.description: log work hours to a specific ticket on behalf of the logged in user, and return the number of hours remaining in their forecast.

406.description: Multiple tickets found with the name
